text: PARIS, July 12 French energy regulator CRE said on Monday it had proposed to the energy and economy ministries that regulated household electricity prices be increased by 0.48% from Aug. 1.It also recommended a 0.38% increase from Aug. 1 for small business.The government is not obliged to follow the CREs recommendations and can ask the regulator to make a new proposal within three months. (Reporting by GV De Clercq Editing by Chris Reese)
